location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Map of portion of Tigris River, Qurhan-Qal’at Salih-Amarah Showing River and Road Communications. Field Surveys by Survey Party I.E.E. “D”. 1915-15’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:910 x 555 mm, on sheet 1015 x 680 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Heliozincographed at the Survey of India Offices, Calcutta. M.A. Hakimkhan, Draftsman.Distinctive Features:Sketch map of the Tigris River between Qurnah and Amarah produced to illustrate ‘Report on the Development of Mesopotamia’ showing the waterway system with canals labelled for reference.Bottom left-hand corner below map: ‘Reg. No. 1321. E 17. SCO’.
